old_prompt: You are a chemistry assistant. Given the molecule SMILES '{smiles}', propose exactly one mutation (one atom/functional group change) and return only the new valid SMILES string. Do not include any extra text or explanation.
new_prompt: You are a chemistry expert specializing in drug design.  Given the molecule SMILES '{smiles}', propose a diverse set of 3-5  mutations (single atom/functional group changes), prioritizing modifications that enhance drug-likeness while maintaining structural novelty. Return only a space-separated list of valid SMILES strings representing these mutations.  Prioritize mutations with predicted improved Lipinski parameters.
